projects.title: WeatherApp
projects.description: A simple weather application that fetches weather data using APIs and displays it in a user-friendly manner.
projects.detailed_des:
WeatherApp

A simple weather application that fetches weather data using APIs and displays it in a user-friendly manner. Developed by Vijay Mudgal.

View on GitHub

Overview

This app fetches real-time weather data from various APIs and displays it in an easy-to-read format. Users can check the weather based on their location or search for other cities globally. The app includes features like temperature, humidity, wind speed, and weather conditions, all in one interface.

Tech Stack

  • Java
  • Retrofit
  • Android SDK
  • Google Maps API
  • Firebase

Features

  • Real-time weather data: Fetches current weather conditions from a reliable source.
  • Location-based forecast: Displays weather based on the user's location or search query.
  • Temperature, humidity, and wind speed: Offers detailed metrics about the weather.
  • Intuitive UI: Simple and easy-to-use design to navigate the app's features.
